Marketplace.AllowedUploadFormats: You may upload a plugin or theme in .zip format via this page.
Marketplace.BeCarefulUsingPlugins: Plugins that are not authored by Piwik team must be used with care: we did not review them.
Marketplace.BeCarefulUsingThemes: Themes that are not authored by Piwik team must be used with care: we did not review them.
Marketplace.DevelopersLearnHowToDevelopPlugins: Developers: Learn how you can extend and customize Piwik by %1$sdeveloping plugins or themes%2$s.
Marketplace.InstallingNewPluginViaMarketplaceOrUploa: You may automatically install %1$s from the Marketplace or %2$supload a %3$s%4$s in .zip format.
Marketplace.ExceptionLinceseKeyIsNotValid: This license key is not valid.
Marketplace.InstallAllPremiumFeatures: Install all Premium Features at once
Marketplace.AllPremiumFeaturesInstalledAndActivated: All Premium Features were successfully installed and activated.
Marketplace.OnlySomePremiumFeaturesInstalledAndActiv: Some Premium Features were not installed successfully.
Marketplace.NotAllowedToBrowseMarketplacePlugins: You can browse the list of plugins that can be installed to customize or extend your Piwik platform. Please contact your administrator if you need any of these installed.
Marketplace.NotAllowedToBrowseMarketplaceThemes: You can browse the list of themes that can be installed to customize the appearance of the Piwik platform. Please contact your administrator to get any of these installed for you.
Marketplace.PaidPluginsNoLicenseKeyIntro: Premium Features are available to all %1$sPiwik PRO%2$s customers. Please insert a licence key below, or get %3$smore details%4$s.
Marketplace.PaidPluginsWithLicenseKeyAndExpireDayInt: Dear %1$s customer, your licence key is valid until %2$s. In case of any questions or problems, please contact us. Enjoy!
Marketplace.PaidPluginsWithLicenseKeyAndNoExpireDayI: Dear %1$s customer, in case of any questions or problems, please contact us. Enjoy!
Marketplace.PaidPluginsNoLicenseKeyIntroNoSuperUserA: Premium Features are available to all %1$sPiwik PRO%2$s customers, get %3$smore details%4$s.
Marketplace.PluginDescription: Extend and expand the functionality of Piwik via the Marketplace by downloading plugins and themes.
Marketplace.PluginUpdateAvailable: You are using version %1$s and a new version %2$s is available.
Marketplace.StepThemeSuccessfullyInstalled: You have successfully installed the theme %1$s %2$s.
Marketplace.StepPluginSuccessfullyInstalled: You have successfully installed the plugin %1$s %2$s.
Marketplace.StepPluginSuccessfullyUpdated: You have successfully updated the plugin %1$s %2$s.
Marketplace.StepThemeSuccessfullyUpdated: You have successfully updated the theme %1$s %2$s.
Marketplace.TeaserExtendPiwikByUpload: Extend Piwik by uploading a ZIP file
Marketplace.LicenseKeyExpiresSoon: Your license key expires soon, please contact %1$s.
Marketplace.LicenseKeyIsExpired: Your license key is expired, please contact %1$s.
Marketplace.FreePluginsLimited: As a %1$s customer, you can only install plugins developed by %2$s to ensure your Piwik is stable and safe.
Marketplace.MultiServerEnvironmentWarning: You cannot install or update the plugin directly as you are using Piwik on multiple servers. The plugin would be only installed on one server. Instead download the plugin and deploy it manually to all your servers.
Marketplace.AutoUpdateDisabledWarning: You cannot install or update the plugin directly as automatic updates are disabled in the config. To enable automatic updates set %1$s in %2$s.
Marketplace.PluginExpiredApiError: The license for plugin '%s' is expired. Please update the license key in the Marketplace or contact Piwik PRO.
